trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The degloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The degloth makes two Razor Fist attacks.

action.name: Razor Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) slashing damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, the target has the {@condition grappled} condition (escape {@dc 18}). Until this grapple ends, the target has the {@condition restrained} condition, and the degloth can't use this fist to grapple another target. The degloth has two fists.
